Slot1.Command: fx br s 5 0.8 / ? bedrock ? @ - 1 6 air > white_stained_glass ? bedrock ? @ - 1 6 white_stained_glass > red_stained_glass
Slot1.Name: Bedrock -> Glass, 2 layers, size 5

Slot4.Command: fx br s 3 0.8 ? | white_stained_glass red_stained_glass ? at 0 1 0 air ? angle - 0 55 1 > sponge
Slot4.Name: Glass -> Floor, size 3
